description:
A young woman is targeted for murder after her wealthy father dies, leaving her the majority of his fortune.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ryo`s an Instructor at a Women`s School? To Protect a Sweet Young Lady
Ryou ga Joshidai Koushi? Uruwashi no Ojou-sama o Mamore
獠が女子大講師? 麗しのお嬢サマを守れ
